entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Reduce cascading errors when record inherits from non-record #63270
  • SelectMany returning `null` crashes the generator driver #63266
  • Unexpected escape analysis behavior for interpolated string with variable of local scope #63262
  • IDE0029 and IDE0030 have the same title #63259
  • MethodNotFoundException when running RoslynDeployment on main #63258

Closed

  • Test plan for "Default Interface Implementation of static members" feature #60968
    17.4
  • Code CleanUp doesnt not work as expected #62727
    17.4
  • File and required modifiers are missing from CSharpAccessibilityFacts.GetAccessibilityAndModifiers #62371
    17.4
  • Configure code style does nothing, does not apply to editorconfig #63216

PullRequests

Created

  • EnC: Log deltas and messages to disk #63269
    Area-Interactive
  • Document build correctness leg #63268
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Dont throw on null return #63267
    Area-Compilers
  • EnC: try to use the document snapshot when validating PDB checksum #63265
    Area-Interactive
  • Produce warning on duplicate analyzer references #63264
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Check interpolated string arguments in Binder.GetValEscape() #63263
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix IDE0053 (Use expression body for lambdas) for command-line builds #63260
    Area-IDE, Community

Merged

  • Upgrade to .NET 7 P6 SDK #63062
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Make bootstrap failures easier to debug #63236
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Fix SyntaxGenerator not working correctly with 'required' #62945
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Move PatternMatching*Tests to Emit2 #63261
    Area-Compilers, Next

Updated

  • Partition helix test runs using historical execution time data #62138
    Area-Infrastructure
  • File types EE support #62812
    Area-Compilers
  • Update method invocation escape analysis to match spec changes #62886
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Semantic snippets - foreach snippet #63058
    Area-IDE
  • Rename internal 'LanguageServices' namespace to not collide with new 'LanguageServices' type. #63249
    Area-IDE
  • Disallow using ScopedRef in source #63046
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Convert to record #62999
    Area-IDE, New Language Feature - Records
  • Filter only valid symbols for inheritance completions #62013
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Move options subsystem over to using SolutionService snapshots. #63245
    Area-IDE
  • Ban api #62921
    Area-IDE
  • Emit MetadataUpdateOriginalTypeAttribute in VB #63194
    Area-Compilers
  • Test PDB checksums emitted for source generated files #63038
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #63250
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Allow Roslyn to access any evaluation properties #62445
    Area-IDE
  • Fix analyzer action state tracking for partial analysis #63206
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers
  • Add ChecksumAlgorithm to project snapshot #62840
    Area-IDE, Needs API Review
  • Avoid resolving parameter.Type in ReportParameterErrors() #63142
    Area-Compilers
